Plot: A cropdusting plane with a fear of heights lives his dream of competing in a famous around-the-world aerial race.
Title: Planes
Writer: John Lasseter (original story by), Klay Hall (original story by), Jeffrey M. Howard (original story by), Jeffrey M. Howard (screenplay)
Actors: Dane Cook, Stacy Keach, Brad Garrett, Teri Hatcher
tomatoConsensus: Planes has enough bright colors, goofy voices, and slick animation to distract some young viewers for 92 minutes -- and probably sell plenty of toys in the bargain -- but on nearly every other level, it's a Disney disappointment.
